title: Bookstore API - Automated Testing Framework with PyTest
description: Designed and implemented an API testing framework for the Bookstore application using PyTest with environment-specific configurations, service object model, and robust assertion strategies. Integrated HTML reporting, slack notifications, CI/CD pipelines, and GitHub Actions cron jobs for scheduled test execution and continuous quality checks.

title: Protocommerce - Selenium Automation Testing - Python & PyTest
description: Implemented a robust end-to-end automation framework for the Protocommerce demo site using Selenium WebDriver and PyTest, focusing on reliability, maintainability, and cross-browser compatibility.

title: OrangeHRM - Selenium Automation Testing - Python & PyTest
description: Developed a comprehensive test automation suite for the OrangeHRM application, including core workflows such as login, utilizing Selenium WebDriver and PyTest for seamless execution.

title: User CRUD operations with Node.js
description: Built a scalable RESTful API to handle user CRUD operations using Node.js and Express, integrated with MongoDB for persistent data storage and structured request handling.

title: DataGridX - A grid wise data visualization with Vue.js
description: Engineered a responsive and interactive data grid component in Vue.js supporting features like pagination, dynamic data rendering, and real-time updates for optimized user experience in data-heavy applications.
